1.0.3.en: Added ability to have State of Charge exclude the minimal SoC value.

1.0.5.en: Guestimate used energy for the Homey energy page.

1.0.6.en: Added functionalities for Round Trip Efficiency

1.0.7.en: Remove setting smartMode for now, causes some issues

1.0.8.en: Improve compatibility with older Homeys, output adjustment setting (to align output with your smart meter)
